description: Retrieves the exclusions preview (a list of ExclusionPreview objects) specified by the preview token. You can obtain the preview token by running the CreateExclusionsPreview API.

parameters.name: assessmentTemplateArn
parameters.description: The ARN that specifies the assessment template for which the exclusions preview was requested.

parameters.name: previewToken
parameters.description: The unique identifier associated of the exclusions preview.

nested_items.name: previewStatus
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of the request to generate an exclusions preview.

nested_items.name: exclusionPreviews
nested_items.description: Information about the exclusions included in the preview.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The name of the exclusion preview.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the exclusion preview.

nested_items.name: recommendation
nested_items.description: The recommendation for the exclusion preview.

nested_items.name: scopes
nested_items.description: The AWS resources for which the exclusion preview pertains.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The resource identifier for the specified scope type.

nested_items.name: attributes
nested_items.description: The system-defined attributes for the exclusion preview.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value assigned to the attribute key.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When a response is generated, if there is more data to be listed, this parameters is present in the response and contains the value to use for the nextToken parameter in a subsequent pagination request. If there is no more data to be listed, this parameter is set to null.
